cinnamon.engine.utils

Class MutableBounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.Bounds
      • cinnamon.engine.utils.MutableBounds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copier<Bounds>, DefinableBounds, Position, Size

    public final class MutableBounds
extends Bounds
implements DefinableBounds, Copier<Bounds>

    Bounds maintaining its box shape while allowing changes to size and position.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MutableBounds()
      Constructs a MutableBounds representing a box at (0,0,0) whose width, height, and depth is 1.
      MutableBounds(Bounds bounds)
      Constructs a MutableBounds with the same position and size as another Bounds.
      MutableBounds(float width, float height, float depth, float x, float y, float z)
      Constructs a MutableBounds with the specified dimensions and the given minimum point.
      MutableBounds(float width, float height, float depth, Point point)
      Constructs a MutableBounds with the specified dimensions and the given minimum point.

        A ClassCastException may be thrown if the intended object class to copy is not the exact same as the class of the given object. This extends to super classes (e.g. if the declared target type is a sub class of the actual given object, implementations may throw the exception).

      • encompass

        public void encompass(float x,
                      float y,
                      float z)
        Description copied from interface: DefinableBounds

        Resizes to include the given point.

        Unlike DefinableBounds.encompass(Point, Point), this overload does not make any previously contained point uncontained, i.e. the shape stretches to include the point.

        Specified by:
        encompass in interface DefinableBounds
        Parameters:
        x - x.
        y - y.
        z - z.
